articles.description: Realme’s upcoming flagship series in India could be called Realme GT. A tipster has claimed that the ‘GT’ moniker of the smartphone, referred to as Realme Race until now, has been trademarked in India. The smartphone is expected to be powered by Qualcomm Snap…
articles.content: Realme's upcoming flagship series in India, referred to as Realme Race until now, could launch as the Realme GT series, as per a tipster. The tipster claims that the moniker has been trademarked in I… [+1941 chars]

articles.title: ASUS Rog Gaming Phone 4 (?) With 16GB RAM Appeared On GeekBench - Gizchina.com
articles.description: The ASUS ROG Gaming Phone 4 has appeared on GeekBench. We think this is the 16GB memory variant, as scores way more.
articles.content: According to wccftech, ASUSs upcoming ROG gaming phone 4 has appeared GeekBench benchmark website. As the latter shows, this phone sports the Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor and has up to 16GB of m… [+2003 chars]

articles.title: Here's a quick look at the 10 most downloaded apps in January 2021 - Zee News
articles.description: Telegram has become the most downloaded non-gaming app worldwide for January 2021 with more than 63 million installs, 3.8 times its downloads in the same month a year ago, according to the latest data released by the app analytics firm Sensor Tower.
articles.content: As WhatsApp struggles with its controversial privacy policies, it has led to a massive drop in its user base. Tapping on this, messaging platforms like Signal and Telegram have seen huge downloads in… [+455 chars]
